src:
Sopir Ngantuk, Mobil Nyangkut di Parit Kalideres Jakbar
05 Nov 2019, 20:51 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Sebuah mobil nyangkut saluran air di daerah Kalideres, Jakarta Barat. Polisi menyebut sopir berinisial AE (18) mengantuk.
"Sopir mengantuk habis kegiatan di kampusnya Universitas Tarumanegara," kata Kanit Laka Lantas Polres Metro Jakarta Barat, Ipda Suyudi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Peristiwa ini terjadi di Jalan Alam Selatan, Kalideres, Jakbar, pada siang hari tadi. Suyudi mengatakan mobil bernomor polisi B-1193-PYO itu mengalami kecelakaan tunggal.
Dia mengatakan AE didampingi kakak iparnya berinisial RF. Mobil tersebut melaju dari arah utara ke selatan di Jl Alam Selatan. Namun di persimpangan tiga, mobil yang seharusnya belok ke kiri malah melaju lurus sehingga masuk ke selokan.
"Tidak ada korban jiwa maupun luka hanya kerugian material kerusakan kendaraan tersebut," ujarnya.
Suyudi mengatakan AE juga tak dalam kondisi terpengaruh minuman beralkohol maupun narkoba. Akibat kecelakaan ini, kerugian ditaksir sekitar Rp 10 juta. Polisi menyita SIM milik AE sebagai barang bukti.

(jbr/fdn)
text:
Sleepy driver, car stuck in the Kalideres ditch in West Jakarta
05 Nov 2019, 20:51 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - A car caught in a water channel in the Kalideres area, West Jakarta. The police said the driver with the initials AE (18) was sleepy.
"The driver was sleepy after the activities at Tarumanegara University's campus," said Kanit Laka Lantas West Jakarta Metro Police, Ipda Suyudi, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
This incident occurred at Jalan Alam Selatan, Kalideres, West Jakarta, at noon this afternoon. Suyudi said the car numbered B-1193-PYO had a single accident.
He said AE was accompanied by his sister-in-law with the initials RF. The car drove from north to south on Jl Alam Selatan. But at intersection three, the car that was supposed to turn left instead drove straight so it entered the gutter.
"There were no fatalities or injuries, only material damage to the vehicle," he said.
Suyudi said AE was also not in a condition affected by alcoholic drinks or drugs. As a result of this accident, the loss was estimated at around Rp. 10 million. The police confiscated AE's driver's license as evidence.

(jbr / fdn)
